LOOPBACK_IPPREFIX_PORT_FOR_NON_EXIST_INT.desc: Configure Loopback Ip-prefix for non-existing Loopback interface.

LOOPBACK_INTERFACE_WRONG_NAT_ZONE_RANGE.desc: Configure wrong value for nat zone.

LOOPBACK_INTERFACE_VALID_NAT_ZONE_RANGE.desc: Configure valid value for nat zone.

LOOPBACK_INVALID_INTERFACE_NAME_LENGTH.desc: Configure invalid value for loopback interface name length.
LOOPBACK_INVALID_INTERFACE_NAME_LENGTH.eStr: Invalid interface name length, it must not exceed 16 characters.

LOOPBACK_DEFAULT_ADMIN_STATUS_UP.desc: Verify admin status is default up for loopback interface
